content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the price. I'm looking for a rent of 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offering but I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than market standards for this location and apartment size.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
